blogPost.excerpt: ICONFi is a digital asset savings platform. ICONFi lets you earn interest on your digital assets including BTC, ETH, ICX, and USDT, and provides a simple solution for staking ICX. ICONFi helps you grow your investments with a simple, secure user interface.
blogPost.body: ICONFi is a digital asset savings platform. ICONFi lets you earn interest on your digital assets including BTC, ETH, ICX, and USDT, and provides a simple solution for staking ICX. ICONFi helps you grow your investments with a simple, secure user interface.
blogPost.title: ICONFi - Keep your savings simple with ICONFi.
blogPost.author: Molly Waldron

localize.description: ICONFi是一个数字资产储蓄平台。ICONFi可以让你赚取包括BTC、ETH、ICX和USDT在内的数字资产的利息，并提供一个简单的ICX押注解决方案。ICONFi以简单、安全的用户界面帮助你增加投资。
ICONFi是一個數字資產儲蓄平臺。ICONFi可以讓你賺取包括BTC、ETH、ICX和USDT在內的數字資產的利息，並提供一個簡單的ICX押注解決方案。ICONFi以簡單、安全的用戶界面幫助你增加投資。

localize.description: 你可能有幾個社交媒體賬戶... ... 我們建立的Luma是您的網上家園，在各大網絡之間。分享您的Luma來與您的觀衆聯繫，展示您的內容，並賺錢。
